<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4433</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Scripture Links</string>
            <string language="es">Enlaces a las Escrituras</string>
            <string language="ga">Naisc leis an Scrioptúr</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Scripture Links</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liens de Scripture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ligações De Scripture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Collegamenti Di Scripture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνδέσεις Scripture</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information about online scripture-related resources which complement the approach taken to Religion in the curriculum.</string>
            <string language="es">Información sobre recursos en línea relacionados con las Escrituras, que complementan la perspectiva tomada para Religión en el currículum.</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolas faoi acmhainní ar líne a bhaineann leis an scrioptúr a chuireann leis an gcur chuige atá sa churaclam i dtaobh an Reiligiúin.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religion</string>
            <string language="es">Religión</string>
            <string language="ga">Reiligiún</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen über scripture-in Verbindung 
stehende Onlinebetriebsmittel, die die Annäherung ergänzen, die zur 
Religion im Lehrplan genommen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Informations sur les ressources scripture-connexes
en ligne qui complètent l'approche adoptée à la religion dans le 
programme d'études.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação sobre os recursos 
scripture-relacionados em linha que complementam a aproximação feita
exame à religião no curriculum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni sulle risorse scripture-relative 
in linea che complementano il metodo adottato alla religione nel 
programma di studi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες για τα σε απευθείας σύνδεση 
σθρηπτuρε-σχετικά στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς που συμπληρώνουν τη 
μέθοδο που υιοθετείται στη θρησκεία στο πρόγραμμα σπουδών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Religião</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Religione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
